preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 80 g of Cesium Sulfide using a digital scale.
2. Measure 320 g of Terbium Oxide.
3. Measure 40 g of Zinc Oxide.
4. Measure 160 g of Sulfur.
5. Combine all measured powders in a clean, dry mixing container.
6. Use a mechanical stirrer or mortar and pestle to ensure an even mixture.
